# removeAllItems()

**Instance Method**

Removes all the menu items in the menu.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeAllItems()
```

## Discussion

This method is more efficient than removing menu items individually.

Unlike the other remove methods, this method does not post [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMenu/didChangeItemNotification] notifications.

## Adding and Removing Menu Items

- **insertItem(_:at:)**: Inserts a menu item into the menu at a specific location.
- **insertItem(withTitle:action:keyEquivalent:at:)**: Creates and adds a menu item at a specified location in the menu.
- **addItem(_:)**: Adds a menu item to the end of the menu.
- **addItem(withTitle:action:keyEquivalent:)**: Creates a new menu item and adds it to the end of the menu.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes a menu item from the menu.
- **removeItem(at:)**: Removes the menu item at a specified location in the menu.
- **itemChanged(_:)**: Invoked when a menu item is modified visually (for example, its title changes).
